sentences.english: So get all sources of sweets, deserts and sugar out of your house.
sentences.chinese: 把各种各样的糖果，甜点和其他糖移出你的房间。

sentences.english: These sesame sweets came from a sweet shop in Beijing earlier this week.
sentences.chinese: 这几块芝麻糖是这周前两天在北京一家糖果铺买的。

sentences.english: They don t need candies or toys.
sentences.chinese: 他们并不需要糖果或玩具。

sentences.english: A bean in liberty is better than a comfit in prison.
sentences.chinese: 闲散的豆子总比监禁的糖果要强。

sentences.english: Chocolate and sweets noy good for you teeth.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力和糖果对牙齿不好。

sentences.english: Some may eat too many sweet things like chocolate or candy.
sentences.chinese: 有些人肯会吃太多的甜食，像巧克力或者是糖果。

sentences.english: The children were ey(e)ing the sweets.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们正眼巴巴地盯着糖果。

sentences.english: A number of Japanese confectioners admitted last year to having mislabelled production and expiry dates for cookies and rice cakes.
sentences.chinese: 去年，多家日本糖果厂承认贴错食品标签和生产日期。

sentences.english: Marshmallow Peeps are America's favorite non-chocolate Easter candies.
sentences.chinese: 果浆软糖是美国最喜欢的非巧克力复活节糖果。

sentences.english: All these are popular trick-or-treat costumes and decorations for greeting cards and windows.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都是受欢迎的糖果服装和装饰贺卡和窗户。

sentences.english: Nature includes four new filters and reincarnates six Eye Candy classics.
sentences.chinese: 性质包括四个新的过滤器和六个轮回眼睛糖果经典。

sentences.english: Why weren’t people duped into favoring the high-priced candies and entrees?
sentences.chinese: 人们为什么不受高价糖果和主菜的诱惑？

sentences.english: You couldn've chopped me into confetti by now if you were in tip-top condition.
sentences.chinese: 你现在这个“巅峰”状态可没法把我切成糖果。

sentences.english: When children see it, they run to it.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子看到糖果屋就会跑过来。

sentences.english: Sweets tittered. It was a ghastly sound.
sentences.chinese: 糖果发出一声恐怖的神经质的笑声。

definition: soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
food preserved in sugar or honey
